code: export const HEARTHSTONE_CLASS_ID=9898;export function getHearthstoneGame(){return new Promise(resolve=>{overwolf.games.getRunningGameInfo(result=>{resolve(result&&result.classId===HEARTHSTONE_CLASS_ID?result:null);});});}export function getGameInfo(){return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{overwolf.games.events.getInfo(info=>{if(info.success){resolve(info.res);}else{reject(info);}});});}
